about_the_game:
Wild Shot: Animal Saviour 

Step into a vibrant jungle adventure where animals need your help! Poachers are on the loose, capturing innocent creatures and keeping them locked away. With your sniper skills and explosive firepower, it’s up to you to stop them and set the animals free! This action-packed demo gives you 8 exciting levels of fast-paced rescue missions in a lush, colorful world full of surprises.

Fun-Filled Rescue Missions

Armed with a sniper rifle and RPGs, every shot counts as you take down hunters, unlock cages, and avoid buried explosives. But the jungle won’t make it easy! Traps, moving vehicles, and sneaky enemies will try to stop you at every turn. Keep an eye out for TNT barrels - a well-placed shot can trigger massive explosions to clear out threats in one big blast!

Rescue, Explore, Protect

Each mission is a race against time as you rescue specific animals, stop poacher jeeps, and collect power-ups to stay in the fight. Grab bullet bags and RPG refills, track down enemies, and use your surroundings to your advantage. Whether you snipe from the shadows or go big with RPG blasts, every level offers new challenges to keep you on your toes!

Be the hero of the jungle 

This cozy yet thrilling demo gives you a sneak peek into the world of Wild Shot: Animal Saviour! Plan your attacks, think quickly, and rescue the animals. Are you ready to take the first step in this wild adventure?

Try The Exciting Jungle Challenges!

  • Sniper & RPG Action: Take precise shots or go big with explosive power.

  • Fast-Paced Rescue Goals: Free specific animals before time runs out.

  • Moving Targets: Stop hunter jeeps carrying caged animals.

  • Hidden Explosions: Spot and trigger TNT for massive chain reactions.

  • Power-Ups: Find bullet bags and RPG refills to stay in the fight.

Keep an eye out for TNT barrels - a well-placed shot can trigger massive explosions to clear out threats in one big blast!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Distribution Released After 2016
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full OpenGL 3.3 support
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Distribution Released After 2020
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.13 (Compatibility) or macOS 10.15
  • Processor: x86_64 or ARM CPU (Apple Silicon)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: x86_64 or ARM CPU (Apple Silicon)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 10.15 or Later
  • Processor: M1 or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board

name: Wild Shot: Animal Savior Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, or any x86_64 CPU
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full OpenGL 3.3 support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: x86_64 CPU with SSE4.2 instructions, with 4 physical cores or more
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board

short_description: The fate of the captured animals is in your hands. Plan your attacks, outsmart the poachers, and prove that one skilled shooter can make a difference in the fight for wildlife. Are you ready to take the shot?
